body.name: Black Bookshelf with Doors,70" Tall Bookcase with Storage Cabinet,6 Tier Book Shelf for Living Room/Bedroom/Office/Kitchen,70"(H)*22.5"(L)*11.8"(W)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 25 mins
features: Large Storage Space:The 6 tier black bookcase with doors and shelves provides a lot of space to store or display your books, CDs, vinyl records, photos, decorations, etc. There are 2 layers inside the cabinet, and 4 layers of open shelves above the cabinet.The combination of closed space and open space can meet the storage needs of different items.

Multifunctional Tall bookshelf:The black bookshelf goes well with any rooms and decor . Perfect for living room、 bedroom、 office、 study room, kitchen, etc,works well as bookshelf、 display shelf、Storage rack.The dimensions of this bookshelf with cabinets:70"(H)*22.5"(L)*11.8"(W).

Stable and Durable:The black bookcase with cabinet is made of high quality P2 particleboard and sturdy metal frame, which is stable and durable. Each shelf can hold up to 50lbs. Good construction make the bookcase stronger, durable and safe.

Easy to Assemble:All accessories and hardware are included in the bookshelf package.We provide a clear and detailed installation instruction.Follow the instructions step by step,you will easy to get the black bookcase .
Satisfactory Customer Service:If you have any questions about this bookshelf, please feel free to contact us, our professional customer service team will answer it for you as soon as possible.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DETAILS OF THE BOOKCASE Doors With Decorative Moldings The doors of the bookshelf have decorative moldings to make the bookshelf look less monotonous. Anti-drop Metal Strip Each open shelves of the bookcase features with anti-drop metal strips, prevent the items on the bookshelf from falling down. Weight Capacity Each layer of the bookshelf has a load-bearing capacity of 50lbs, which can meet the needs of daily storage.

Anti-tip Accessories The bookshelf units is sturdy but still recommend to be secured to a wall to avoid the risk of tipping. Set Screws An important fastener to make furniture parts stay firm, secure plastic wedges at the 4 corners of the back to better hold the back in place. Adjustable Foot Pad Make sure the bookshelf can be leveled even on uneven ground and protect the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but directions could be unclear
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is very sturdy and aesthetically pleasing. It was a little challenging to assemble - the directions were not detailed but I was able to assemble it. It did take me, on my own, probably 4 hrs to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very strong and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: Great addition to show out my collection of stuff I enjoy while also being storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is just great in every way !
reviews.reviewText: I love these bookshelves, as you can see I'm using mine in my dining area for all my plants. And the bottom storage is going to hold all my other products I use for my plants and be hidden away and not on my kitchen counter any more. These are wonderfully made, they are not hard to put together, and very very sturdy. I bought 2 of them and if my plant collection grows I will order more. Love these. If you order these you won't be disappointed .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to be my collectible and DnD shelf, and while the bottom section isn't big enough to contain my dice bag (yeah, it's monstrous in size. xD), it does work for what I needed it for! It is VERY sturdy, even on the thick carpet I have in my room.

reviews.reviewText: I loved this beautiful open shelfed n 2 door bookcase. It exceeded my expectations. Thank u Elene Kelsey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good combination of wood and steel!
reviews.reviewText: Have gotten a lot of put-it-together shelving units over the years, and this one is one of the better ones.Easy to put together, with very clear instructions (even though it was a "Wordless Workshop" type of instruction book with pictures only, no descriptive words to say HOW to do it), and good engineering for stability and sturdiness.Details that I like:< Good organization of hardware and furniture pieces, with each item clearly spelled out in the instructions. Made assembly very easy (took less than two hours as a one-man project).< Combination of steel frame and painted plywood/particleboard shelves, doors and cabinet sides.< Backing board for back of cabinet slid in easily into grooves - not just tacked onto the back like a lot of these type pieces of furniture.< I especially like the placement of the shelves with a crossbar welded between each shelf to help keep books from sliding off the shelf!< Adjustable leg/feet to adjust for any floor evenness issues.< The doors to the cabinet part are on hinges that are spring loaded! Made it EXTREMELY easy to attach the doors!< Shelves and other wood parts have a distinct wood-grain look, even though painted black.< Most hardware had extras (none was missing).< There was several points where, as I was assembling it, I found the hardware connection redundant to double up the strength. This impressed me!Details that I didn't like:< There was a part that I could not figure out what it was for or where to put it (part #15, I believe). So I just stored these parts with the spare parts.When all done, I was easily able to carry it by myself to its designated spot. Very tall, nice depth, but very, very sturdy! Definitely recommend!
